中国网络电视台点播插件完全采用XBMC内置播放器播放天翼视讯点播和直播内容，可在所有操作系统平台使用。

extension.summary: 中国网络电视台直播插件
extension.description: CNTV Live video plugin[CR][CR]Note: [CR]1.The plugin will auto call CCTVPlayerOcxReg.exe to regist player ocx at the first run.[CR]2.The default key setting of the external player similar as XBMC: F8 - Mute / F9 - VolumeDown / F10 - VolumeUp / [ - ZoomIn / ] - ZoomOut / SPACE - Pause / X - Exit[CR]You can run key setting program to custom the key map for external player, file path:[CR]plugin.video.cntv-live\resources\player\KeymapSet.exe[CR]3.on the non-PRC OS environment, you need to do the following settings:[CR]On Windows 7 (similar for Windows XP):[CR]Go to "Control Panel"=>"Region and Language"=>Select Tab "Administrative"[CR]Click button "Change system locale" to "Chinese (Simplified, PRC)"[CR]and restart the machine as instructed.

中国网络电视台直播插件[CR][CR]说明：[CR]1.首次进入本插件会自动运行CCTVPlayerOcxReg.exe进行播放控件注册；[CR]2.外挂播放器按键默认设置与XBMC相近：F8 - 静音 / F9 - 音量减 / F10 - 音量增 / [ - 画面缩小 / ] - 画面放大 / SPACE - 播放暂停 / X - 关闭程序[CR]你也可以运行插件文件夹下的设置程序调整按键：[CR]plugin.video.cntv-live\resources\player\KeymapSet.exe

Tudou.com is the first and leading online video platform in China, where users can upload, view and share video clips.Tudou went live on April 15, 2005 and has grown into one of the world’s largest content delivery networks. A comprehensive video entertainment destination, Tudou's content library includes user generated videos, premium licensed contents, and in-house developed programming.

土豆网(Tudou.com)是中国最早和最具影响力的视频分享网站，是中国网络视频行业的领军品牌，也是全球最早上线的视频分享网站之一。土豆网视频内容包括三大类：[CR]* 网友自行制作或分享的视频节目，例如播客和用户原创视频；[CR]* 来自土豆众多内容提供商的视频节目，例如电影、电视剧和MV等等。土豆网与2500多家国内外知名的音乐厂牌、内容制作方、内容代理商和电视台建立了广泛的深度合作。[CR]* 土豆投资制作的节目，例如土豆摄线等等日播栏目及系列短剧。

TV189.com is a professional online video service provider founded by Esurfing Media Co.,Ltd. TV189.com focuses on high-definition video content. All content on TV189.com is legal and strictly abides by copyright laws and regulations helping promote the healthy development of the video industry in China. Currently, TV189.com has a wide selection of video content, which covers movies, TV series, variety shows, documentaries, games and other popular programs. TV189.com brings together nearly 100 live TV cable channels and several leading content companies, and covers nearly 80% of the total video content in China.
TV189.COM是中国电信股份有限公司视讯运营中心（以下简称“视讯运营中心”）推出的网络视频播放平台，是国内首家专注于提供超清（1080P）网络视频服务的大型专业网站。影视内容丰富多元，涵盖电影、电视剧、综艺、娱乐、纪实、游戏、原创等热门领域，还聚集了近百家卫视直播频道和数家国内知名网络视频合作方内容。覆盖了国内近80%的视频内容。
